fields.request: Exercise the public chat widget and verify staff escalation
fields.request_details:
1. Load the public site and open the chat widget. Submit a visitor message and confirm it appears immediately in the drawer.
2. Sign into the Django admin and open the Chat sessions module; verify the new session contains the message transcript.
3. With the visitor still connected, wait for the idle escalation window and confirm a NetMessage/Slack alert is generated when staff notifications are enabled.
